article_title: Despite Jackson's Presence, Talk of Triangle Offense Is Misplaced
article_text:
Since the Knicks officially brought Phil Jackson on board as team president last week, one word has come up more than any other: Triangle.

People are interested in knowing whether Carmelo Anthony can be better used in Jackson's triangle offense. And there has already been speculation on how big a factor the triangle might be in Jackson's choice...

twitter.description: Lost amid all the chatter about Phil Jackson's triangle offense: The Knicks' real problem is their awful defense.
twitter.title: Stop With All the Triangle Talk

image.alt: Yes, Phil Jackson is with the Knicks, but let's stop all the triangle talk.
